page.title: 18Poynton Pool
page.content: {Poynton Park,}once the home of the Vernon family is now used by the public.It has been decided to keep the park as natural as possible.In the park there is an artificial lake. This lake,known as{Poynton Pool}has natural islands to encourage wildlife.Canada Geese,Swans,Coots, Mallards and Crested Grebe have been seen.The pool is stocked with bream, carp,tench,perch,chub and pike by the Stockport Angling Federation who rent the pool.The grassland is rented by a local farmer for grazing. The park is used for the following annual events:Agricultural and Horticultural show, Steam engine and Vintage vehicle show, Civic Bonfire organized by Poynton Round Table.
